title: The Crown of Thorns Story
creator_contributor_role: Educational Information Service Great Barrier Reef Marine Park Authority, producer
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Great Barrier Reef (Qld.)
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Great Barrier Reef (Qld.)
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Conservation of natural resources
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Natural history
description: This video presents the most up to date report on the Crown of Thorns available in Australia today. The documentary tells the story of the Crown of Thorns on the Great barrier Reef. It traces the history of the infestations and what is now known about the starfish with special emphasis on the research currently underway.
